00025 #ifndef LINE_H
00026 #define LINE_H

00028 #define LINE_TEM template <class num> inline
00029 #define LINE_FUN Line2d<num>
00030 
00031 #define LazyCaching
00032 //using namespace GVector;
00033 template <class num> class Line2d;
00034 
00035 template <class num>
00036 class Line2d{
00037 private:
00039   GVector::vector2d<num> p0,p1;
00041   mutable GVector::vector2d<num> dir;
00043   mutable GVector::vector2d<num> perp;
00045   mutable num length;
00047   mutable bool updateRequired;
00049   static const num eps = 1e-5;
00050   
00051 public:
00052   //Constructors, Setters
00053   Line2d();
00054   Line2d(GVector::vector2d<num> _p1);
00055   Line2d(GVector::vector2d<num> _p0, GVector::vector2d<num> _p1);
00056   Line2d(num p0x, num p0y, num p1x, num p1y);
00057   void set(GVector::vector2d<num> _p0, GVector::vector2d<num> _p1);
00058   void set(num p0x, num p0y, num p1x, num p1y);
00060   void calcValues() const;
00061   
00062   //Common Math Functions related to lines
00064   num closestDistFromLine(GVector::vector2d<num> p, bool endcaps);
00066   num distFromLine(GVector::vector2d< num > p, GVector::vector2d< num > rayDir, bool extendLine);
00068   num distFromLine1(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num rayDir, bool extendLine);
00070   GVector::vector2d<num> perpFromLine(GVector::vector2d<num> p, bool endcaps);
00072   bool liesAlongside(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num margin = 0.0);
00074   bool intersects(Line2d<num> l1, bool extendL0, bool extendL1, bool touch);
00076   bool intersects(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool extendL0, bool extendL1, bool touch);
00078   bool intersects(GVector::vector2d<num> v, bool extendL0, bool extendL1){return intersects(Line2d<num>(v), extendL0, extendL1);}
00080   bool intersects(GVector::vector2d<num> p, GVector::vector2d<num> rayDir, bool touching);
00082   bool intersects(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num rayDir);
00084   GVector::vector2d<num> intersectTest(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool &intersects, bool extendL0, bool extendL1);
00086   GVector::vector2d<num> intersection(Line2d<num> l1, bool extendL0, bool extendL1);
00088   GVector::vector2d<num> intersection(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool extendL0, bool extendL1);
00090   Line2d<num> rotate(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num angle);
00092   GVector::vector2d<num> project_in(GVector::vector2d<num> p);
00094   GVector::vector2d<num> project_out(GVector::vector2d<num> p);
00096   char* ToString(char* str);
00097   
00098   //Getters
00099   inline const GVector::vector2d<num>& P0() const {return p0;}
00100   inline const GVector::vector2d<num>& P1() const {return p1;}
00101 #ifdef LazyCaching
00102   inline const GVector::vector2d<num>& Dir() const {if(updateRequired) calcValues(); return dir;}
00103   inline const GVector::vector2d<num>& Perp() const {if(updateRequired) calcValues(); return perp;}
00104   inline const num Length() const {if(updateRequired) calcValues(); return length;}
00105   inline const num Angle() const {if(updateRequired) calcValues(); return dir.angle();}
00106 #else
00107   inline GVector::vector2d<num> Dir() const {return (p1-p0).norm();}
00108   inline GVector::vector2d<num> Perp() const {return (p1-p0).perp().norm();}
00109   inline num Length() const {return (p1-p0).length();}
00110   inline num Angle() const {return (p1-p0).angle();}
00111 #endif
00112   
00113   //Operator overloads
00115   Line2d<num> operator*(num f) const;
00117   Line2d<num> operator/(num f) const;
00119   Line2d<num> &operator*=(num f);
00121   Line2d<num> &operator/=(num f);
00123   Line2d<num> operator+(GVector::vector2d<num> v) const;
00124   Line2d<num> operator-(GVector::vector2d<num> v) const;
00126   Line2d<num> &operator+=(GVector::vector2d<num> v);
00127   Line2d<num> &operator-=(GVector::vector2d<num> v);
00128 };
00129 
00130 typedef Line2d<double> line2d;
00131 typedef Line2d<float> line2f;
00132 typedef Line2d<int> line2i;

00135 LINE_FUN::Line2d()
00136 {
00137   p0.zero();
00138   p1.zero();
00139 #ifdef LazyCaching
00140   //calcValues();
00141   updateRequired = true;
00142 #endif
00143 }

00149   p1 = _p1;

00151   //calcValues();
00152   updateRequired = true;
00153 #endif

00163   updateRequired = true;

00171   p1.set(p1x, p1y);

00174   updateRequired = true;
00175 #endif

00182   p1 = _p1;

00185   updateRequired = true;

00193   p1.set(p1x, p1y);

00196   updateRequired = true;

00200 LINE_TEM
00201 void LINE_FUN::calcValues() const
00202 {
00203   length = (p1-p0).length();
00204   dir = (p1-p0)/length;
00205   perp = dir.perp();
00206   updateRequired = false;
00207 }
00208 
00209 LINE_TEM
00210 num LINE_FUN::closestDistFromLine(GVector::vector2d<num> p, bool endcaps)
00211 {
00212 #ifdef LazyCaching
00213   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00214 #else
00215   calcValues();
00216 #endif
00217   num dist = fabs(perp.dot(p-p0));
00218   num locationOnLine = dir.dot(p-p0);
00219   
00220   if(locationOnLine<0.0 && endcaps){
00221     return (p-p0).length();
00222   }else if(locationOnLine>length && endcaps){
00223     return (p-p1).length();
00224   }
00225   return dist;
00226 }
00227 
00228 LINE_TEM
00229 num LINE_FUN::distFromLine(GVector::vector2d<num> p, GVector::vector2d<num> rayDir, bool extendLine)
00230 {
00231   #ifdef LazyCaching
00232   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00233   #else
00234   calcValues();
00235   #endif
00236   num result = 0.0;
00237   if(intersects(p,rayDir) || extendLine){
00238     num sinTheta = dir.cross(rayDir.norm());
00239     result = fabs(perp.dot(p-p0)/sinTheta);
00240   }else{
00241     result = NAN;
00242   }
00243   if(result<0.0){
00244     printf("Fail2! %d %f %f %f\n",(intersects(p,rayDir) || extendLine)?1:0,dir.cross(rayDir.norm()), perp.dot(p-p0), result);
00245     fflush(stdout);
00246   }
00247   return result;
00248 }
00249 
00250 LINE_TEM
00251 num LINE_FUN::distFromLine1(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num rayDir, bool extendLine)
00252 {
00253   #ifdef LazyCaching
00254   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00255   #else
00256   calcValues();
00257   #endif
00258   calcValues();
00259   GVector::vector2d<num> heading;
00260   heading.heading(rayDir);
00261   num result = 0.0;
00262   if(intersects(p,heading,false) || extendLine){
00263     num sinTheta = dir.cross(heading.norm());
00264     result = fabs(perp.dot(p-p0)/sinTheta);
00265   }else{
00266     result = NAN;
00267   }
00268   if(result<0.0){
00269     printf("Fail1! %d %f %f %f\n",(intersects(p,heading,false) || extendLine)?1:0,dir.cross(heading.norm()), perp.dot(p-p0), result);
00270     fflush(stdout);
00271   }
00272   return result;
00273 }
00274 
00275 LINE_TEM
00276 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::perpFromLine(GVector::vector2d<num> p, bool endcaps)
00277 {
00278   #ifdef LazyCaching
00279   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00280   #else
00281   calcValues();
00282   #endif
00283   num d = dir.dot(p-p0);
00284   if((d>=0.0 && d<=length) || !endcaps){
00285     // Lies (alongside line), or (beyond line but using extension of line)
00286     return ( (p-p0) - dir*d );
00287   }else{
00288     // Beyond line and using endcaps
00289     if(d<0.0)
00290       return (p-p0);
00291     else
00292       return (p-p1);
00293   }
00294 }
00295 
00296 LINE_TEM
00297 bool LINE_FUN::liesAlongside(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num margin)
00298 {
00299   #ifdef LazyCaching
00300   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00301   #else
00302   calcValues();
00303   #endif
00304   num location = (p-p0).dot(dir);
00305   return (location>-margin && location<length+margin);
00306 }
00307 
00308 LINE_TEM
00309 bool LINE_FUN::intersects(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool extendL0, bool extendL1, bool touch)
00310 {
00311   #ifdef LazyCaching
00312   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00313   #else
00314   calcValues();
00315   #endif
00316   //GVector::vector2d<num> perp1 = perp;//(p1-p0).perp();
00317   //Check to see if lines intersect within their extents, or if it is okay to extend lines
00318   if(touch)
00319     return ( (extendL1 || (perp.dot(p2-p0)*perp.dot(p3-p0)<=eps)) && (extendL0 || ((p3-p2).perpdot(p0-p2)*(p3-p2).perpdot(p1-p2)<=eps)) );
00320   else
00321     return ( (extendL1 || (perp.dot(p2-p0)*perp.dot(p3-p0)<0.0)) && (extendL0 || ((p3-p2).perpdot(p0-p2)*(p3-p2).perpdot(p1-p2)<0.0)) );
00322 }
00323 
00324 LINE_TEM
00325 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::intersectTest(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool &intersects, bool extendL0, bool extendL1)
00326 {
00327   #ifdef LazyCaching
00328   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00329   #else
00330   calcValues();
00331   #endif
00332   GVector::vector2d<num> dir2 = (p3-p2).norm();
00333   
00334   num den = dir.y*dir2.x - dir.x*dir2.y;
00335   num ua = (dir.y*(p0.x-p2.x) - dir.x*(p0.y-p2.y))/den;
00336   
00337   GVector::vector2d<num> p = p2 + ua*dir2;
00338   num position0 = dir.dot(p-p0);
00339   num position1 = dir2.dot(p-p2);
00340   
00341   intersects = true;
00342   if( (!extendL0 && (position0<0.0 || position0>length)) || (!extendL1 && (sq(position1)>(p3-p2).sqlength())) )
00343     intersects = false;
00344   
00345   return p;
00346 }
00347 
00348 LINE_TEM
00349 bool LINE_FUN::intersects(Line2d<num> l2, bool extendL0, bool extendL1, bool touch)
00350 {
00351   #ifdef LazyCaching
00352   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00353   #else
00354   calcValues();
00355   #endif
00356   //GVector::vector2d<num> perp1 = perp;//(p1-p0).perp();
00357   //Check to see if lines intersect within their extents, or if it is okay to extend lines
00358   if(touch)
00359     return ( (extendL1 || (perp.dot(l2.P0()-p0)*perp.dot(l2.P1()-p0)<=eps)) && (extendL0 || (l2.Perp().dot(p0-l2.P0())*l2.Perp().dot(p1-l2.P0())<=eps)) );
00360   else
00361     return ( (extendL1 || (perp.dot(l2.P0()-p0)*perp.dot(l2.P1()-p0)<-eps)) && (extendL0 || (l2.Perp().dot(p0-l2.P0())*l2.Perp().dot(p1-l2.P0())<-eps)) );
00362 }
00363 
00364 LINE_TEM
00365 bool LINE_FUN::intersects(GVector::vector2d< num > p, GVector::vector2d< num > rayDir, bool touching)
00366 {
00367   #ifdef LazyCaching
00368   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00369   #else
00370   calcValues();
00371   #endif
00372   GVector::vector2d<num> v0 = p0-p;
00373   GVector::vector2d<num> v1 = p1-p;
00374   if(v0.cross(v1)<0.0)
00375     swap(v0,v1);
00376   
00377   if(touching)
00378     return ( v0.cross(rayDir)>=0.0 && v1.cross(rayDir) <= 0.0 ); //Check if rayDir lies within the angle reqion between v0 and v1
00379   else
00380     return ( v0.cross(rayDir)>eps && v1.cross(rayDir) < -eps ); //Check if rayDir lies within the angle reqion between v0 and v1
00381 }
00382 
00383 LINE_TEM
00384 bool LINE_FUN::intersects(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num rayDir)
00385 {
00386   #ifdef LazyCaching
00387   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00388   #else
00389   calcValues();
00390   #endif
00391   GVector::vector2d<num> heading;
00392   heading.heading(rayDir);
00393   
00394   return intersects(p, heading,false);
00395 }
00396 
00397 LINE_TEM
00398 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::intersection(GVector::vector2d< num > p2, GVector::vector2d< num > p3, bool extendL0, bool extendL1)
00399 {
00400   #ifdef LazyCaching
00401   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00402   #else
00403   calcValues();
00404   #endif
00405   GVector::vector2d<num> dir2 = (p3-p2).norm();
00406   
00407   num den = dir.y*dir2.x - dir.x*dir2.y;
00408   num ua = (dir.y*(p0.x-p2.x) - dir.x*(p0.y-p2.y))/den;
00409   
00410   GVector::vector2d<num> p = p2 + ua*dir2;
00411   num position0 = dir.dot(p-p0);
00412   num position1 = dir2.dot(p-p2);
00413   
00414   if( (!extendL0 && (position0<0.0 || position0>length)) || (!extendL1 && (sq(position1)>(p3-p2).sqlength())) )
00415     return GVector::vector2d<num>(NAN,NAN);
00416   
00417   return p;
00418 }
00419 
00420 LINE_TEM
00421 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::intersection(Line2d< num > l1, bool extendL0, bool extendL1)
00422 {
00423   #ifdef LazyCaching
00424   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00425   #else
00426   calcValues();
00427   #endif
00428   GVector::vector2d<num> p02 =l1.P0();
00429   GVector::vector2d<num> dir2 = l1.Dir();
00430   
00431   num den = dir.y*dir2.x - dir.x*dir2.y;
00432   num ua = (dir.y*(p0.x-p02.x) - dir.x*(p0.y-p02.y))/den;
00433   
00434   GVector::vector2d<num> p = p02 + ua*dir2;
00435   num position0 = dir.dot(p-p0);
00436   num position1 = dir2.dot(p-p02);
00437   
00438   if( (!extendL0 && (position0<0.0 || position0>length)) || (!extendL1 && (position1<0.0 || position1>l1.Length())) )
00439     return GVector::vector2d<num>(NAN,NAN);
00440   
00441   return p;
00442 }

00444 LINE_TEM
00445 Line2d<num> LINE_FUN::rotate(GVector::vector2d<num> p, num angle)
00446 {
00447   #ifdef LazyCaching
00448   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00449   #else
00450   calcValues();
00451   #endif
00452   GVector::vector2d<num> _p0 = p + (p0-p).rotate(angle);
00453   GVector::vector2d<num> _p1 = p + (p1-p).rotate(angle);
00454   return Line2d<num>(_p0,_p1);
00455 }

00457 LINE_TEM
00458 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::project_in(GVector::vector2d<num> p)
00459 {
00460   #ifdef LazyCaching
00461   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00462   #else
00463   calcValues();
00464   #endif
00465   return GVector::vector2d<num>(dir.dot(p-p0),perp.dot(p-p0));
00466 }
00467 
00468 LINE_TEM
00469 GVector::vector2d<num> LINE_FUN::project_out(GVector::vector2d<num> p)
00470 {
00471   #ifdef LazyCaching
00472   if(updateRequired) calcValues();
00473   #else
00474   calcValues();
00475   #endif
00476   return (dir*p.x + perp*p.y);
00477 }

00479 LINE_TEM
00480 char* LINE_FUN::ToString(char* str)
00481 {
00482   snprintf(str,64, "(%8.3f,%8.3f) - (%8.3f,%8.3f)",V2COMP(p0),V2COMP(p1));
00483   return str;
00484 }

00486 #define LINE_UNARY_OPERATOR_SCALAR(op) \
00487   LINE_TEM \
00488   Line2d<num>& LINE_FUN::operator op (num f) \
00489   {                   \
00490     p0 = p0 op f;   \
00491     p1 = p1 op f;   \
00492     updateRequired = true;     \
00493     return(*this);    \
00494   }

00499 #define LINE_BINARY_OPERATOR_SCALAR(op) \
00500   LINE_TEM \
00501   Line2d<num> LINE_FUN::operator op (num f) const\
00502   {                   \
00503     GVector::vector2d<num> p0_ = p0 op f;   \
00504     GVector::vector2d<num> p1_ = p1 op f;   \
00505     return(Line2d<num>(p0_,p1_));    \
00506   }

00509 LINE_BINARY_OPERATOR_SCALAR(/)

00514   {                   \
00515     GVector::vector2d<num> p0_ = p0 op v;   \
00516     GVector::vector2d<num> p1_ = p1 op v;   \
00517     return(Line2d<num>(p0_,p1_));    \
00518   }

00526   {                   \
00527     p0 = p0 op v;   \
00528     p1 = p1 op v;   \
00529     updateRequired = true;     \
00530     return(*this);    \
